div.p: This case-sensitive code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/measure-improvement-notation defines the following codes:

tr.td: Improvement is indicated as an increase in the score or measurement (e.g. Higher score indicates better quality).
Improvement is indicated as a decrease in the score or measurement (e.g. Lower score indicates better quality).

description.value: Observation values that indicate what change in a measurement value or score is indicative of an improvement in the measured item or scored issue.
